gov.usgs.anss.indexutil

Class IndexFileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.indexutil.IndexFileUtil

  • public class IndexFileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a template for an EdgeThread (one that can be run by EdgeMom. It includes a timeout on the run() and a registered shutdown handler. At a minimum IndexBlockUtil should be replaced to the new class And IChk replaces with a short hand for the class. (ETT??).

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexFileUtil

        public IndexFileUtil(java.lang.String file,
                     boolean ro)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.io.IOException
        creates an new instance of LISSCLient - which will try to stay connected to the host/port source of data. This one gets its arguments from a command line
        Parameters:
        file - Filename to open like yyyy_ddd_inst
        ro - Open read only
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if one occurs
        java.io.IOException

      • isChkFormat

        public boolean isChkFormat()
        is this file in "chk" file format( the preamble of the index is not same format and the date fields are probably not filled out!)

        True if the file is in chk file format
